nodes.bodyText:
This could be combined into one operation:
return (TR::Compiler->cls.romClassOf(clazzPointer)->modifiers & (J9AccAbstract | J9AccInterface)) ? false : true;

! is the logical not. What you want here is to isolate the two bits you are interested in, and then test they have the values you want:
(modifiers & (J9AccInterface | J9AccAbstract)) == J9AccAbstract
